title: A Beginner's Guide to Rakes
description: When the recently widowed Diane Benchley decides to spend her late husband's fortune by opening an exclusive gentleman's gaming club, no one is more suited to help her than the Marquis of Haybury, Oliver Warren--but striking a deal with Diane might be the biggest risk Oliver has ever taken.Listen to A Beginner's Guide to Rakes, Vol. 1: Scandalous Brides on your smartphone or desktop computer.
author: Suzanne Enoch
